episodes.title: Dustin Lance Black: ABC's 'When We Rise'
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Filmmaker Dustin Lance Black visits The Treatment to discuss his passion for chronicling the LGBT movement of 1970s San Francisco in the ABC miniseries When We Rise.

episodes.title: Casey Affleck & Matt Damon: Manchester by the Sea
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: EXCLUSIVE PODCAST: Elvis Mitchell in conversation with Manchester by the Sea star Casey Affleck and producer Matt Damon, recorded live at the Landmark Theater.

episodes.title: Steve Conrad: Patriot
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Director Steve Conrad discusses male ego and timelessness in Season 2  of Amazon's Patriot.

episodes.title: Michelle Monaghan: The Path
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Michelle Monaghan joins Elvis to discuss the strength and darkness of her character Sarah on Hulu's The Path.

episodes.title: Hua Hsu: A Floating Chinaman
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Author Hua Hsu stops by to discuss his book A Floating Chinaman, recounting the life of 1930's actor/writer H.T. Tsiang and his struggles entering the American literary world.

episodes.title: Theodore Melfi: Hidden Figures
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Director Theodore Melfi discusses the importance of the highlighting the three African American women very instrumental in 1960s NASA space program in Hidden Figures.

episodes.title: Stacy Title: The Bye Bye Man
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: EXCLUSIVE PODCAST: Director Stacy Title visits The Treatment to discuss the back story of The Bye Bye Man and being a female filmmaker in the horror genre.

episodes.title: Viggo Mortensen: Captain Fantastic
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Ator Viggo Mortensen discusses the open-minded environment of director Matt Ross' set on the film Captain Fantastic.

episodes.title: Ryan Gosling & Damien Chazelle: La La Land
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Actor Ryan Gosling and director Damien Chazelle join Elvis today to discuss keeping the musical La La Land uplifting.

episodes.title: Chris Messina: Live by Night
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Actor Chris Messina visits The Treatment to discuss playing a prohibition-era gangster beside Ben Affleck in Live by Night.

episodes.title: Dennis Bartok & Jeff Joseph: A Thousand Cuts
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Authors Dennis Bartok and Jeff Joseph discuss the underground film collector scene in their book A Thousand Cuts.

episodes.title: James L. Brooks: The Edge of Seventeen
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: EXCLUSIVE PODCAST: Longtime television producer James L. Brooks talks The Edge of Seventeen on The Treatment.

episodes.title: Byron Howard & Rich Moore: Zootopia
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Directors Byron Howard and Rich Moore join Elvis Mitchell to discuss the politically relevant animated film Zootopia.

episodes.title: Matt Ross: Captain Fantastic
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Director Matt Ross discusses Captain Fantastic and his intent to make impactful films.

episodes.title: Will Speck & Josh Gordon: Office Christmas Party
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: WEB BONUS: Office Christmas Party directors Will Speck and Josh Gordon talk love for 80s comedies.

episodes.title: Chuck Rose: The Art of More
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: The Art of More creator Chuck Rose joins Elvis to discuss NYC auction house corruption and paving the way for success with streaming service, Crackle.

episodes.title: Kenneth Lonergan: Manchester by the Sea
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Writer/director Kenneth Lonergan join Elvis Mitchell to discuss creating believable on-screen human interaction in Manchester by the Sea.

episodes.title: Simon Helberg: Florence Foster Jenkins
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Actor Simon Helberg discusses success from simply doing something, opposed to how well you actually do it as evidenced in Florence Foster Jenkins.

episodes.title: Ben Younger: Bleed for This
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Director Ben Younger talks to Elvis Mitchell about his return to filmmaking with Bleed for This.

episodes.title: Kenya Barris: Black-ish
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Black-ish creator Kenya Barris joins Elvis Mitchell to discuss utilizing his show as a conversation starter.

episodes.title: Sid Mashburn: Men's clothing designer
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: EXCLUSIVE PODCAST: Men's clothing designer Sid Mashburn joins Elvis Mitchell to discuss the launch of his Santa Monica store.

episodes.title: Colin Farrell: The Lobster
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Actor Colin Farrell stops by The Treatment to discuss the unusual world of The Lobster.

episodes.title: Will Welch: GQ Style Editor-In-Chief
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell, KCRW
episodes.summary: GQ Style Editor-In-Chief Will Welch joins Elvis Mitchell to discuss combining his love for style, design and music for GQ.

episodes.title: Jeff Nichols: Loving
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell, KCRW
episodes.summary: Director Jeff Nichols joins Elvis Mitchell to discuss historical race equality as reflected in his film Loving.

episodes.title: Omari Hardwick: “Power”
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell, KCRW
episodes.summary: Actor Omari Hardwick stops by The Treatment to discuss his hesitation in playing lead role of Ghost in Starz’ Power.

episodes.title: Michael Weatherly: Bull
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Actor Michael Weatherly discusses making the move to "the guy" in Bull.

episodes.title: Molly Shannon: Other People
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Actress Molly Shannon discusses her departure from comedy in emotional new film Other People.

episodes.title: Mike O'Malley: Survivor's Remorse
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Actor Mike O'Malley explores with idea of giving back to those that help you become successful in the series Survivor's Remorse.

episodes.title: Martin Lawrence: Doin' Time: Uncut
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Comedian and actor Martin Lawrence joins Elvis Mitchell to discuss getting back on stage after 14 years in his new stand-up special Doin' Time: Uncut.

episodes.title: Justin Bartha: White Girl
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Actor Justin Bartha joins Elvis Mitchell in a discussion on his dark, provocative new film White Girl.

episodes.title: Kenneth Turan: Not to Be Missed
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Author Kenneth Turan stops by to share excerpts and opinions from his book Not to Be Missed: Fifty-Four Favorites from a Lifetime of Film.

episodes.title: Mark Anthony Green: GQ Style Guy
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: WEB BONUS: Mark Anthony Green, GQ's Style Guy, joins Elvis Mitchell to discuss his journey to becoming the go-to guy for fashion at the men's style magazine.

episodes.title: Baz Luhrmann: The Get Down
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Director Baz Luhrmann joins Elvis Mitchell to discuss his ten year endeavor in creating the Netflix original series The Get Down.

episodes.title: Sharon Jones & Barbara Kopple: Miss Sharon Jones!
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Soul singer Sharon Jones and director Barbara Kopple discuss cancer and the healing power of soul music in Miss Sharon Jones!

episodes.title: Anna Gunn: Equity
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Actress Anna Gunn discusses the struggles and successes of powerful women in the world of investment banking in Equity.

episodes.title: Dennis Hauck: Too Late
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Director Dennis Hauck joins Elvis Mitchell to discuss the importance of Techniscope and the 1962 film Carnival of Souls in his directorial debut Too Late.

episodes.title: James Schamus: Indignation
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Director James Schamus visits The Treatment to chat about his directorial debut in the adaptation of the Philip Roth novel Indignation.

episodes.title: Paul Feig: Ghostbusters
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Director Paul Feig visits The Treatment to discuss the pop culture pressures of rebooting Ghostbusters and the surprising responses to its release.

episodes.title: Richard Dreyfuss: Madoff
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Actor Richard Dreyfuss joins Elvis in a discussion on civics and his portrayal of the infamous Ponzi scheme fraudster in Madoff.

episodes.title: Roseanne Barr & Eric Weinrib: Roseanne For President!
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Roseanne Barr & filmmaker Eric Weinrib visit The Treatment to discuss documenting Roseanne on her journey to the White House in “Roseanne For President!”.

episodes.title: Roger Ross Williams: Life, Animated
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Academy Award winning documentarian Roger Ross Williams joins Elvis Mitchell in a conversation on autism, as documented in his newest film Life, Animated.

episodes.title: Taika Waititi: Hunt for the Wilderpeople
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Director Taika Waititi visits The Treatment to discuss his version of an Australasian 80’s action movie in Hunt for the Wilderpeople.

episodes.title: Tyler, The Creator: Golf Wang
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Artist and fashion designer Tyler, The Creator discusses how film helped to create the concept behind the runway debut of his fashion line Golf Wang. (Contains explicit content.)

episodes.title: Cliff Martinez: Neon Demon
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Film composer Cliff Martinez joins Elvis Mitchell to talk intentions and meaning of auditory accompaniment in his newest work Neon Demon,

episodes.title: Fenton Bailey & Randy Barbato: Mapplethorpe
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Filmmakers Fenton Bailey and Randy Barbato discuss controversy and timelessness in their documentary Mapplethorpe: Look at the Pictures.

episodes.title: Jessica Goldberg: The Path
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Creator Jessica Goldberg joins Elvis Mitchell to discuss her autobiographical journey in creating Hulu's cult drama The Path.

episodes.title: Julia Lee: Our Gang: A Racial History of 'The Little Rascals'
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Author Julia Lee joins Elvis Mitchell to discuss how an American children's television show from the 1920's attempted to transcend racism in her book Our Gang: A Racial History of "The Little Rascals."

episodes.title: Leonardo DiCaprio: The Wolf of Wall Street
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Following Django Unchained and The Great Gatsby, actor Leonardo DiCaprio continues to explore the corruption of the American Dream in The Wolf of Wall Street. (Repeat)

episodes.title: Shane Black: The Nice Guys
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: After 13 years of various attempts at telling the "nice guys" story, director Shane Black joins Elvis Mitchell to talk about finding the right medium for the buddy cop film The Nice Guys.

episodes.title: Eugene Levy & Dan Levy: Schitt's Creek
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Actor Eugene Levy and his son Dan Levy visit The Treatment to discuss their new comedy series Schitt's Creek.

episodes.title: Tony Okungbowa: Echo Park
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Actor/DJ Tony Okungbowa visits The Treatment to discuss producing and starring in Echo Park.

episodes.title: Don Cheadle: Miles Ahead
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Actor Don Cheadle joins Elvis Mitchell to discuss portraying jazz legend Miles Davis in his directorial debut, Miles Ahead.

episodes.title: Owen Gleiberman: Movie Freak
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Film critic Owen Gleiberman visits The Treatment to discuss his roots in film analysis as movies helped him feel "connected" during childhood. He explains this and more in his new book Movie Freak.

episodes.title: Dave Navarro & Todd Newman: Mourning Son
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Musician Dave Navarro and director Todd Newman join Elvis Mitchell to discuss their film Mourning Son.

episodes.title: Haile Gerima: Ashes and Embers
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Filmmaker Haile Gerima joins Elvis Mitchell to discuss African American displacement in white society in Ashes and Embers.

episodes.title: Reggie Watts: Creative Control
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Creative force Reggie Watts stops by to discuss his interest in virtual reality with his film Creative Control.

episodes.title: Illeana Douglas: I Blame Dennis Hopper
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Actress Illeana Douglas stops by to discuss her eclectic life in and out of the movies as told in her memoir I Blame Dennis Hopper.

episodes.title: Larry Karaszewski & Scott Alexander: American Crime Story
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Screenwriting team Larry Karaszewski and Scott Alexander discuss their approach in combining social satire with tragedy in American Crime Story: The People vs. O.J. Simpson.

episodes.title: Ray Liotta: Shades of Blue
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Actor Ray Liotta stops by to discuss his interesting and unexpected character in NBC's Shades of Blue.

episodes.title: George Miller: Mad Max: Fury Road
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Director George Miller joins Elvis Mitchell to discuss the Oscar nominated fourth installment of his film franchise, Mad Max: Fury Road.

episodes.title: Quentin Tarantino: The Hateful Eight
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Director Quentin discusses his fascination with honor and the lack thereof in The Hateful Eight.

episodes.title: Carrie Brownstein: Portlandia
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Musician/actor Carrie Brownstein joins Elvis Mitchell to discuss writing a memoir and kicking off the final season of Portlandia.

episodes.title: Saoirse Ronan: Brooklyn
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Elvis Mitchell in conversation with Brooklyn star Saoirse Ronan, recorded live at the Landmark Theater.

episodes.title: Jay Roach: Trumbo
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Director Jay Roach joins Elvis Mitchell to discuss the role screenwriter Dalton Trumbo played in the "Hollywood Ten" as told in the film Trumbo.

episodes.title: Robert Trujillo: Jaco
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Musician Robert Trujillo joins Elvis Mitchell to discuss the journey from found footage to family input of the visionary bass player Jaco Pastorius while producing the documentary Jaco: The Film.

episodes.title: Rainn Wilson: Thom Pain (based on nothing) and The Bassoon King
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Actor Rainn Wilson stops by The Treatment to discuss his personal and professional transformations as highlighted in his new book The Bassoon King: My Life in Art, Faith, and Idiocy and in his monologue performance in Thom Pain (based on nothing).

episodes.title: Adam McKay: The Big Short
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: "What if pop culture told us what we needed to know?" Director Adam McKay discusses the state of pop culture and economic oversights highlighted in The Big Short.

episodes.title: Jim Nelson: GQ Editor-in-Chief
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: GQ's editor-in-chief Jim Nelson joins Elvis Mitchell to discuss how the magazine influences the power of celebrity and style.

episodes.title: F. Gary Gray: Straight Outta Compton
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Director F. Gary Gray discusses his personal connection to the NWA biopic Straight Outta Compton.

episodes.title: Ben Mendelsohn: Mississippi Grind
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Ben Mendelsohn joins Elvis Mitchell to discuss his Emmy nomination and taking on gambling addiction for his role in Mississippi Grind.

episodes.title: Adam Scott: Krampus
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Actor Adam Scott visits The Treatment to discuss his holiday horror film Krampus.

episodes.title: Ian McKellen: Mr. Holmes
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Actor Sir Ian McKellen joins Elvis Mitchell to discuss his film Mr. Holmes

episodes.title: Tom Hooper: The Danish Girl
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: EXCLUSIVE PODCAST: Elvis Mitchell in conversation with The Danish Girl director Tom Hooper, recorded live as part of the Film Independent at LACMA. program.

episodes.title: Ryan Coogler: Creed
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Director Ryan Coogler joins Elvis Mitchell to discuss his film Creed.

episodes.title: Frank Spotnitz: Amazon's 'The Man in the High Castle'
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Frank Spotnitz joins Elvis Mitchell to discuss his Amazon Original Series The Man in the High Castle, a visual adaptation of the Philip K. Dick novel of the same name.

episodes.title: Cary Fukunaga: Netflix's 'Beasts of No Nation'
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: WEB EXCLUSIVE: Filmmaker Cary Fukunaga joins Elvis Mitchell to discuss the true vulnerability of family in Netflix's Beasts of No Nation.

episodes.title: Benicio Del Toro: Sicario
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Actor Benicio Del Toro joins Elvis Mitchell to discuss his film Sicario.

episodes.title: Gaspar Noé: Love
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Elvis Mitchell in conversation with Love director Gaspar Noé and actors Aomi Muyock and Karl Glusman, recorded live at the Theatre at Ace Hotel. (Contains explicit content. Listener discretion is advised.)

episodes.title: Randall Park: Fresh Off The Boat
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Actor Randall Park joins Elvis Mitchell to discuss the relatability of his character Louis Huang on Fresh Off The Boat.

episodes.title: Olivia Wilde: Meadowland
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: WEB EXCLUSIVE: Actress Olivia Wilde stops by to discuss her role as a grief stricken mother in the drama Meadowland.

episodes.title: Aziz Ansari: Netflix's 'Master of None'
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Comedian and actor Aziz Ansari visits The Treatment to discuss his new Netflix series Master of None.

episodes.title: Alex Borstein: HBO's 'Getting On'
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Alex Borstein on the success of her varied career and the pleasure involved in portraying Dawn in HBO's Getting On.

episodes.title: Colin Hanks: All Things Must Pass
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Colin Hanks shares his lengthy journey of documenting the rise and fall of Tower Records in All Things Must Pass.

episodes.title: Eileen Heisler & DeAnn Heline: The Middle
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Eileen Heisler and DeAnn Heline, creators of the sitcom The Middle, join Elvis Mitchell to discuss the show's seventh season.

episodes.title: Davis Guggenheim: He Named Me Malala
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: WEB BONUS: Filmmaker Davis Guggenheim joins Elvis Mitchell for a Q&A following a screening of He Named Me Malala at LACMA.

episodes.title: Sarah Silverman: I Smile Back
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Sarah Silverman discusses the darkness that both drama and comedy share and pulling from that for her new film I Smile Back.

episodes.title: Richard Gere & Oren Moverman: Time Out of Mind
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: WEB EXCLUSIVE: Actor Richard Gere and director Oren Moverman discuss the experiential approach taken while highlighting homelessness in their new film Time Out of Mind.

episodes.title: Eli Roth: 'Knock Knock' & 'Green Inferno'
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Filmmaker Eli Roth discusses the inspiration behind his two latest films, Knock Knock and The Green Inferno.

episodes.title: Robert Zemeckis and Tom Rothman: The Walk
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Robert Zemeckis and Tom Rothman discuss difficulties in large studio filmmaking and the balance of making an "anti-authoritarian" film that the entire family can enjoy.

episodes.title: Sam Elliott: Grandma
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Sam Elliott discusses his stand out year, highlighting his rewarding acting experience in Grandma.

episodes.title: Jim Moore: GQ
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Jim Moore visits The Treatment to discuss men's fashion and his 35 year long career as Creative Director of GQ.

episodes.title: Baltasar Kormákur: Everest
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Director Baltsar Kormákur discusses working from chaos on the set of Everest.

episodes.title: Jonathan Ames: Blunt Talk
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Creator and executive producer Jonathan Ames talks about representing masculinity in Blunt Talk, his new series for Starz.

episodes.title: Marielle Heller: Diary of a Teenage Girl
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Director Marielle Heller joins Elvis Mitchell to discuss developing the graphic novel Diary of a Teenage Girl into her feature film directorial debut.

episodes.title: Cameron Bailey: Toronto International Film Festival
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: WEB EXCLUSIVE: Cameron Bailey discusses the history of the Toronto International Film Festival and what to expect from this year's event.

episodes.title: Peter Bogdanovich: She's Funny That Way
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Peter Bogdanovich discusses the writing process for She's Funny That Way and how he assembled the cast for his latest release.

episodes.title: Jason Segel: The End of the Tour
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Jason Segel channels David Foster Wallace in his newest film The End of the Tour.

episodes.title: Courtney Kemp Agboh: Power
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Power creator Courtney Kemp Agboh discusses Shakespearean influences and her love of New York, making the city just one of the multi-dimensional characters in her Gatsbyesque crime drama.

episodes.title: Paul Weitz: Grandma
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Tackling comedy on a smaller scale, director Paul Weitz discusses his new indie film, Grandma.

episodes.title: Vivica A. Fox: 6 Ways to Die
episodes.author: KCRW, Elvis Mitchell
episodes.summary: Always keeping family as a source of inspiration, Vivica A. Fox shares her intentions in choosing film roles and what she learned while filming her newest release, 6 Ways to Die.
